page.title: 20NEWTONMORE, PUPILS' VIEWS
page.content: Newtonmore is a nice place to live in..... the people have warm friendly accents. (Mandy) It is the place where the skiers come. (Gail F.) Up Craig Dhu there are some golden eagles. (Wendy) The main sport is shinty, the great stick game of the Gaels. (Pamela) The world's 1st pony trecking was opened in Newtonmore 30 years ago. (Donna) This area was once a seething cauldron of clan feuds. (Shirley) Wildflowers spring in abundance in the summer meadows and there are alpine rarities on the high tops. (Pamela) The Highland Games is held each year on the first Saturday in August. (Michael) Newtonmore has a golf course, people are made welcome. (Donna) There are lovely walks. (Wendy) Newtonmore has: The Spey, The Calder and The Aultlaurie. (Donna) See a wildcat or a pinemartin. (Wendy)
